name: Water boy
description:
Hey yall, thanks for checking out my game. Currently the game is very incomplete which i'm sure you will see. I know about some bugs but if you find any please let me know. Also, use 1600 x 900 resolution if possible, the resolution greatly affects your vision in the game which is very important. 

to get the water gun, press e on the ! blocks twice

Use the level select to try new levels if you find one too hard to beat.
